subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 32 points and the Cavaliers held off the Houston Rockets, 91-85, last night in Cleveland, spoiling Yao Ming’s first game back from a leg injury.
snippet: LeBron James scored 32 points and the Cavaliers held off the Houston Rockets, 91-85, last night in Cleveland, spoiling Yao Ming’s first game back from a leg injury.
